full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 408 Filed 11/03/21 Page 7 of 7 LAW OFFICES OF BOBBI C. STERNHEIM It is incumbent on the Court to address these concerns and ensure that Ms. Maxwell's health and well-being are not further degraded by the punitive conditions of her confinement in the MDC and in the courthouse. Release is the appropriate and just remedy. Very truly yours, Bobbi C. Sternheim BOBBI C. STERNHEIM cc: All counsel 7 DOJ-OGR-00006062

text_blocks.content: LAW OFFICES OF BOBBI C. STERNHEIM

It is incumbent on the Court to address these concerns and ensure that Ms. Maxwell's health and well-being are not further degraded by the punitive conditions of her confinement in the MDC and in the courthouse. Release is the appropriate and just remedy.

organizations: LAW OFFICES OF BOBBI C. STERNHEIM

additional_notes: The document appears to be a letter from Bobbi C. Sternheim to the Court regarding the health and well-being of Ms. Maxwell. The letter is typed with a handwritten signature. There are no visible redactions or damage.
